meanings.sent1: The software was downloadable, so I could easily save it to my computer.
meanings.sent2: The movie was downloadable online, so I could watch it anytime.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog app was so funny that I imagined a downloadable dog translator.
meanings.sent4: The concept of time as a downloadable file is intriguing, like being able to pause a moment forever.
meanings.sent5: The image of a downloadable map that leads to hidden treasures stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The new album was downloadable on the artist's website for free.
meanings.sent2: The latest updates for the app were downloadable from the app store.
meanings.sent3: I found it amusing that the recipe for a downloadable cake turned out to be a prank.
meanings.sent4: The idea of happiness being a downloadable emotion is a striking thought.
meanings.sent5: The concept of love as a downloadable feeling resonated with me deeply.
